description: Oasis City has been envisioned and is being created by Moiin, South Korea’s leader in haptic and precision VR equipment. Through its years of experience and partnerships with South Korea’s leading research institution, Moiin is breaking new ground in the world of Virtual Reality. Through the decentralized Oasis City Platform, Moiin is laying the foundation for humanity’s explosion into the world of Virtual Reality. As a cornerstone of the 4th Industrial Revolution, Virtual Reality presents one of the greatest opportunities for expansion in experience, commerce, medicine, and every other area of business and personal operations. Through making this system decentralized, Moiin has established Oasis City as a hub for human creativity and experience and has laid the foundation for the free exchange of ideas, experiences, and digital assets.
name: Oasis City
